metadata.title: Asgard Skane Thor's Hammer Pendant on Chain - Red
description: This stunning Thor's hammer pendant is a replica of one from from the Viking period that was found in Skane, Sweden. The hammer and dragon heads on the chain are cast from pewter and the chain and hanging loop are both stainless steel. The stone is made from glass, which was a rare material 1000 years ago and was often used in jewellery because of its expensive nature. The length of the item is approx. 50cm and it weighs approx. 125g.
